浟字的基本解释

浟
yōu
〔浟浟〕（水）缓缓流动的样子，如“淇水浟浟。”

浟
dí
〔浟浟〕贪利的样子，如“六世耽耽，其欲浟浟。”

浟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yóu］
［《廣韻》以周切，平尤，以。］
见“浟浟”。
[②]［dí］
［《集韻》亭歷切，入錫，定。］
见“浟2浟”。

浟字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浟； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页624第01
【廣韻】以周切【集韻】夷周切，?音由。【玉篇】水流貌。【木華·海賦】浟湙瀲灧。通作滺。　又【集韻】亭歷切，音狄。速也。【易·頤卦】其欲浟浟。今作逐逐。【前漢·敘傳註】浟浟，欲利貌。

Xun
Basic explanation of words
Xun
yōu
〔浟浟〕(Water) The appearance of flowing slowly, such as "Qi Shui 浟浟."
Xun
dí
[浟浟] The appearance of greed for profit, such as "The sixth life is delayed, and it wants to be rushed."
Xun

[②]［dí］

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　浟; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 624 01
[Guang Yun] Cut by Zhou [Ji Yun] Yi Zhou cut,? Sound origin. [Jade articles] Water flow appearance. 【Muhua·Haifu】Chaun 潋潋灧. Pass for 滺.　[Jiyun] Pavilion Liqie, Yindi. Speed also. 【Easy·Yi Gua】It wants to run. This is one by one. [Previous Han·Xu Chuan Annotation] 浟浟, desire good looks.
